episodes.title: The Darkest Kids TV Show Ever Made
episodes.description:
🌎 Get an exclusive 15% discount on Saily data plans! Use code crowley at checkout. Download Saily app or go to https://saily.com/crowley ⛵

In 1985, vhs tapes were sent to numerous households containing a kids television program called  “Life With Grandpa”. Despite appearing as your standard children’s puppet show, its content, purpose and real life connections have gone on to make it perhaps the most disturbing kid’s show ever made. 

I DON’T CONDONE THE HARASSMENT OF ANY INDIVIDUAL OR GROUP DISCUSSED IN THIS VIDEO.

MUSIC USED:

Crystal Cola by White Bat Audio - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d0FcNUXnpg4&t=0s

Maria’s Purpose Pt. 2 from Silent Hill 2 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o-ZdbkjVxy8&t=226s 
Just a Shadow by CO.AG Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YgCNDtIdUIs
Judah’s Lullaby by Repulsive - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=etUsdJ5a_jY
I’ll Hide My Scars by Repulsive - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gUxJmS9Uxas
Penumbra by Repulsive - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hnCxHJolKZU
Combing Town West from Silent Hill 2 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mbTysoQy38U
Homesick by Repulsive - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gQSNy4vpglo
Now he understands by Repulsive - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7EZCHZoWDf8
Wake Up In the Dark by CO.AG Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TkoLxwCahrE

CHAPTERS: 
0:00 - Intro
2:19 - Life With Grandpa 
10:03 - Life Of Grandpa
11:37 - David Berg
16:26- The Law of Love
21:25 - Trust and Obey 
24:07 - Grandpa
26:15 - The Story of Davidito 
36:19 - Peter Puppet 
40:22 - epilogue
